title: Sport green eyeshadow like Disha Patani
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by disha patani (paatni) (@dishapatani) on Sep 16, 2019 at 6:08am PDT

1. Start by cleansing, toning, and moisturising your skin, and apply a lip balm to your lips.2. Prep your skin with a pore minimising primer.3. Blend a dewy foundation onto your face and neck.4. Conceal any blemishes with an illuminating concealer.5. Use an eyebrow pomade to fill in your brows and blend the product in with a spoolie brush.6. Apply a metallic mint green eyeshadow all over your lids.7. Create winged lines with liquid eyeliner on your upper lash lines.8. Amp up your lashes with lengthening mascara.9. Apply a liquid highlighter to the high points of your face such as the cheekbones, temples, brow bones, cupids bow, and bridge of your nose.10. Dab an apricot blush on the apples of your cheeks and blend.11. Swipe on a coral lipstick.12. Set your makeup with a spritz of makeup setting spray.
description: Move away from dark green and opt for a light green lids like Disha Patani Move away from dark green and opt for a light green lids like Disha Patani
